main.desc: Al-driven Web3 Attention Economy and Value Distribution Platform

feature.title: What is kapkap ?
feature.subTitle: The world's first Web3 interaction & value distribution platform deeply integrating Al and attention economy
feature.desc1: Powered by the innovative KAPs Al Reputation System, we build an ecosystem engine driven by "AlGC + Attention Economy + lssuance Services".
feature.desc2: With games as the native entry point to support early user growth and incentive models, the platform gradually expands to broader Web3 fields, transforming multi-dimensional behaviors such as gaming, creation, tasks, and brand interactions into quantifiable and tradable attention and reputation assets.
feature.desc3: Turn every game, interaction, and content consumption into valuable digital assets.

core.title: Core uses of k-score
core.content1: Enhance Benefits & Privileges: Holding NFTs minted via K-Score increases future platform airdrop benefits (e.g. token allocation weight) and unlocks exclusive in-game privileges (e.g., extra tasks, fast pass).
core.content2: Stake for $KAPS: Stake reputation value corresponding to K-Score to earn $KAPS (platform ecosystem token) periodically. Longerstaking duration and higher K-Score level lead to higher revenue weight.
core.content3: Redeem ln-Game Resources: Consume K-Score to directly redeem core resources (e.g., in-game currency, stamina, rare materials) for multiple cooperative games. Resources arrive in real-time, supporting cross-game flexible use.
core.bottomContent: K-Score transforms attention into cross-scenario value-from NFT minting to benefit enhancement, from staking rewards to resource redemption, building a full-link user incentive system.

summary.title: SUMMARY - COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES
summary.itemContent1: AI + Web3 + Attention Economy, flling the gap in high-quality blockchain game platforms within the BSC ecosystem.
summary.itemContent2: Pioneer the Al-driven "User Attention & Reputain System" to reshape value distribution logic.
summary.itemContent3: Beta version launched, with 1.7M+ MAU, over 880K total communitymembers, and cooperation with high-quality projects like SOG &IdleKnights.
summary.itemContent4: Team from top gaming companies, invested by leading institutions likeAnimoca, solidifying the ecological trust foundation.

model.title: ATTENTION SUPPLY ECONOMY MODEL
model.bottomContent: KapKap regards attention as a sustainable production factor, achieving ecological self-proliferation and win-win through the flywheel cycle.

revenue.title: PLATFORM REVENUE & GROWTH MODEL
revenue.itemContent1: Intelligent distribution based on K-Score, charging service fees.
revenue.itemContent2: Assist project parties in issuance, sharing revenue from profits.
revenue.itemContent3: The platform charges subscriptions or fees fromcreators using AlGC tools.
revenue.itemContent4: Provide SDK and data analysis services to developers.
revenue.itemContent5: Such as staking $KAPS to obtain privileges,transaction fee discounts, etc.

socialData.title: USER & SOCIAL MEDIA DATA
socialData.bottomItem1Content: Expected to reach 500K-lM registered players, forming a payment & fssion closed loop via $KAPS
socialData.bottomItem2Content: Expected to reach 100K users, verifying scenarios for the attention accumulation system.
socialData.bottomText2: Curent data solidifes the ecological foundation, and Beta games are expected to further expand user scale and verify attention value.

ecosystem.title: KAPS: AN AI-DRIVEN NEW MODEL FOR ATTENTION ECONOMY
ecosystem.para1Content: Only count clicks, ignoring users' real Engagement and Influence
ecosystem.para2Content: Via K-Score, transform multi-dimensional behaviors(gaming, creation, social interaction) into quantifiable and tradable attention and reputation assets
ecosystem.step1Content: K1(Basic Gaming Value): Based on users' gaming behavior data, including:
ecosystem.step1Desc1: Login frequency, gaming duration, task completion rate
ecosystem.step1Desc2: Historical payment amount, payment frequency, ARPU
ecosystem.step1Desc4: K1 = ∑(Standardized (Activity, Payment Value, Achievements)) / Number of Dimensions
ecosystem.step2Content: K2 (SocialInfluence Value): Based on users'socialinfluence inside and outside the platform, including:
ecosystem.step2Desc3: Content sharing, inviting new users, community activity
ecosystem.step2Desc4: Combined with blockchain behaviors, such as NFT holdings, token transaction records

roadmap.title: KapKap Development Roadmap
roadmap.step1_desc: Launch the growth flywheel and build the core engine
roadmap.step1_1: Expand the game matrix, integrate multiple cooperative games, and verify the platform's user acquisition capability.
roadmap.step1_2: Launch the core KAPs mechanism and K-Score system to realize attention quantification and incentive distribution.
roadmap.step1_3: Open the Task Center to provide users with initial participation channels and reward access.
roadmap.step2_desc: Establish market mechanisms and achieve value discovery
roadmap.step2_1: Launch attention asset circulation and internal settlement functions to initially realize assetization.
roadmap.step2_2: Upgrade the K-Score model, open the advertiser backend, and initiate accurate and transparent attention transactions.
roadmap.step2_3: Direct connection with advertisers and brands: Implement precision advertising placement based on attention assets.
roadmap.step3_desc: Expand ecosystem boundaries and deepen user incentives
roadmap.step3_1: Launch the open beta of the MOBA game and social gaming companion system to enter medium-to-hardcore gaming scenarios.
roadmap.step3_2: Initiate the advertising revenue sharing mechanism, allowing $KAPS stakers and high-reputation users to share the platform's growth dividends.
roadmap.step3_3: Use AlGC to realize personalized content and task recommendations, enhancing ecosystem activity.
roadmap.step4_desc: Become an open infrastructure to drive cross-ecosystem growth
roadmap.step4_1: Fuly open the Al growth engine and developer SDK to support third-party projects in quick integration.
roadmap.step4_2: Establish a cross-project attention interconnection mechanism to realize ecosystem synergy effects.
roadmap.step4_3: Integrate $KAPS into all economic links to complete the construction of a closed-loop ecosystem.

qa.title: Q&A
qa.a1: KapKap is the world’s first "attention middle layer," connecting players, creators, and brands through AI, AIGC, and on-chain payment technologies to build a Web3 entertainment and creation ecosystem. Its core is to quantify every browse, interaction, creation, or share by users into tangible value, ultimately forming a self-sustaining, continuously expanding on-chain ecosystem.
qa.q2: What can I do on KapKap?
qa.a2: Players can accumulate attention and redeem rewards by using platform apps and engaging in interactions (e.g., browsing, liking, sharing), while enjoying personalized experiences. Creators can leverage AI tools to efficiently generate content, reach audiences precisely, monetize works easily, and build community influence. Brands can target audiences accurately via user profiles for effective marketing and content collaboration.
qa.q3: How does attention convert into tangible value?
qa.a3: Users’ attention behaviors (e.g., browsing duration, likes, comments, shares, payments) are quantified by the system using behavioral data and on-chain records, converted into transferable rewards (such as digital assets or benefits). These actions not only bring users real returns but also boost ecosystem activity, benefiting creators and brands.
qa.q4: What specific roles do AI and AIGC play in KapKap?
qa.a4: AI analyzes user interests, community relationships, and on-chain behaviors to generate multi-dimensional profiles, recommending the most relevant content to users and helping creators target audiences precisely. AIGC assists creators in quickly generating/iterating content, optimizing release strategies, reducing trial-and-error costs, and improving creation and promotion efficiency.
qa.q5: What are the advantages of on-chain payments? How secure are they?
qa.a5: On-chain payments support cross-chain and multi-chain, adapting to different users’ asset types. Earnings arrive in real-time with transparent, traceable records, avoiding intermediate interference. Backed by blockchain technology, transactions are fully encrypted and traceable, ensuring security and giving creators peace of mind when monetizing.
qa.a6: It suits players seeking tangible value from daily interactions; creators aiming to create efficiently and monetize precisely; and brands/communities needing to reach target users and improve marketing efficiency. Every role finds matching value in the ecosystem.
qa.q7: How does KapKap’s ecosystem operate cyclically?
qa.a7: Players contribute attention and behavioral data to drive ecosystem activity; creators produce content based on these needs to gain earnings and influence; brands collaborate to meet user needs and drive content commercialization. The three form a closed loop with circulating, growing value, enabling the ecosystem to self-sustain.
qa.a8: If you’re a player, log in to access apps and games on the KapKap platform directly. If you’re a project party (e.g., creator or brand), submit an application, and we’ll contact you via email promptly.

kscore.title: EXISTING PLATFORM PROJECTS
kscore.item1Advantage: Features low-threshold earning mechanics (mining ores, treasure chests, and points on the map) and high user stickiness, providing KapKap with behavioral data samples of "earning-driven users" (high login frequency, strong goal orientation, and continuous participation motivation)
kscore.item1Coop: Precisely match profit-oriented user groups via K-Score and deliver scenario-based tasks (User Withdrawal Conversion Rate Increased by 35%)
kscore.item2Advantage: Known for simple interaction experience and high retention rate, providing KapKap with data samples of "long-tail gamers" (high-frequency login, low investment but continuous attention contribution)
kscore.item2Coop: Match user groups via K-Score and deliver customized tasks (User Retention Rate Increased by 50%)
kscore.item3Type: Blockchain-based Multiplayer Online Battle Arena (MOBA) Game
kscore.item3Advantage: Integrated multiple high-quality IP resources, including collaboration with Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC)
kscore.item3Coop: Precisely reach high-value users via KapKap (Customer Acquisition Cost Reduced by 30%)

genkiMint.title: GENKIMINER EXCLUSIVE NFT MINTING
genkiMint.desc: Minting requires corresponding K-score. Successfully minted NFTs will be directly deposited into your NFT Warehouse.
genkiMint.name: Name
genkiMint.costHint: Minting multiple NFTs at onece can effectively help you save on gas fees
genkiMint.bindTgAccountToGetKscore: Bind Telegram Account to Get K-Score
genkiMint.step1: Please bind the Telegram account associated with your game account (binding is irreversible).
genkiMint.step2: Click the button to check if your game account meets the minting requirements.
genkiMint.step3: Bind your BSC Chain wallet to receive the NFT airdrop (binding is irreversible).
genkiMint.step4: Mint your exclusive NFT, which will provide generous bonuses to your game account.
genkiMint.mappingHint: You must bridge your NFTs to the BSC chain to be eligible for the airdrop rewards.
